overview: Directed by Carca, an unforgettable double album by Spinetta is recreated: Pescado 2, recorded between 1972 and 1973. The concert takes place within the framework of the Luis Alberto Spinetta cycle: Essential Records, dedicated to revisiting his productions that left a mark on the collective memory.  Considered a cult work, the album brings together great psychedelic rock themes. Carca is presented in trio format with Gustavo Torres on bass and Francisco Malissia on drums. Pablo Hadida joins on guitar and arrangements and guests.
title: Spinetta. Discos esenciales: Pescado 2
